content.rendered:
Bank Credit Analyst | Tulsa, OK
  • Full-time Credit Analyst position with previous experience required
  • Must have working experience working with financial statements and creating spreadsheets
  • Must have excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Must be able to work well independently
  • $40k-55k/year DOE
